summary: This document is a subpoena from UMB Bank, NA, requesting comprehensive financial records for Ghislaine Maxwell and several associated entities from inception to present. It details specific types of records required, including account documents, transaction records, wire transfers, and correspondence.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary individual for whom all financial records are being subpoenaed, along with associated entities.

locations.name: UMB Bank, NA 1010 Grand Blvd Kansas City, MO 64106
locations.context: The bank from which the financial records are being requested.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to UMB Bank for all financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities (Terramar Project Inc., Ellmax LLC, Max Foundation, and an unnamed SERVICES CORP).
The request is exceptionally broad, covering all open and closed accounts from inception to present, including joint, trustee, fiduciary, custodian, executor, or guardian accounts.

The subpoena demands a wide range of document types, including transaction records, signature cards, identification, wire transfers, safe deposit records, loan applications, and all related correspondence.
The request specifically includes digital records such as online banking information, IP addresses, MAC addresses, and session logs.
The document indicates a deep financial investigation into Maxwell's affairs, seeking to trace funds and document the operations of her associated corporate entities.
